ka 403a10 Replaced folios: Kha 1-6/7, Kha-Nga 1, 4, Ga 1-6, 10, 12; Ga-Ma 300b (the original folio is glued on a new one, with its verso side re-written), Ka 1-10, Ka-Ma 400, Ka 401 - 403 The volume starts with its bam po 32; the beginning of chap. 30 (correspon+ding to Q Ri 134b1-137b7) is contained in vol. Ka. The text of Kha-Ma 38b1 is continued Kha-Ma 39a1. Kha-ma 38b2-10 contains an unidentified passage in dbu med Kna-Nga 4a8 contains the beginning og the concluding formula of chap. 35 shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo// (bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo) continued Ga 1b1. Kha-Nga 4a9; zhus dag|| Ga 1b1 starts with part of the concluding formula of chap. 35: (bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo) sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las bzod pa'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa lnga pa'o// Ga-Ma 300b4: zhus dag| mang+ga laM Ka 1b1 starts with a repeatition of the last sentence from the previous volume: dge slong rgya mtsho'i rgyal mtshan gyi drung nas song ngo//

Dedication: ri mtho' sa rtsang spu rgyal bod kyi yul || gnas chen brgyad kyi yan lag g+han d+ha la || ri de la rten+d pa'i ti nan 'dir || ya rabs chos skyong rdo rje pa la khrungs || 'bangs rnams zhi bas bces pas chab srid ri bas ri bas brtan || dkon mchog dbu' dbangs bstod pas | phyi ma byang chub thob || nor zas sgyu mar gzigs pas || mdo sde 'gyur 'od bzhengs || mchod gnas 'degs pa'i jee Na bzang gnyis dang | dam [chos] rgyas par byed pa'i yig mkhan rdo rje rtse || thub pas dga' bo mngal mjug bstand pa bzhin || bstan+d nas dga' bo dgra bcom thob pa bzhin | yom mcho la thub pas chos bstand x [ ? ] rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par shog || || || na mo 'gu ru sku thod pa

62 Go07,03 Ka-Ma 9a1-36b2 (Vol. 7) 'phags pa yul 'khor skyong gis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo A r+ya ra pa mA pa ri prid tsa nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra rgya gar gyi mkhan po 'dzi na myi tra dang / da na shi la dang / mu ne bar ma dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsha ba ban de ye shes [sdes] bsgyurd cing zhus te / skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa / 1.

Ka-Ma 26a7 F 296 is a slightly (ca. 2 fols.) longer version of the sūtra contained in the Rat+nakūṭa collection; it's title is given as Rāṣṭrapāla (ra sta pa la)-m.s./ Pho brang 'khor skyong zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo, without the additions Ārya/'Phags paandthe usual introduction for titles in this collection: 'Phags pa dKon brtsegs pa bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo las. It has no colophon. L 122 contains almost 10 folios more than 643.18andgives the title as Ārya Pūstupāla- paripṛcchā n.m.s./'Phags pa Yul 'khor skyong gis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo, without the introduction 'Phags pa dKon brtsegs pa bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo las. Its colophon is identical to that in Go.

65 Go08,02 Ca 16a4-32a8 (Vol. 8) sgyu ma mkhan bzang po lung bstand pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo pan tra mA yA ka ra bya ka ra na nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra rgya gar gyi mkhan po 'dzi na myi tra dang / prad nya bar ma dang zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban de ye shes sde las sogs pas bsgyurd cing zhus te gtan la phab pa
66 Go08,03 Ca 32a8-62a10 (Vol. 8) 'phags pa cho 'phruld chen po bstand pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo A r+ya ma hA prA ti hA rya u pa de sha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra rya gar gyi mkhan po 'dzi na myi tra dang // su ren dra bo de dang / prad nya bar ma dang // zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban de ye shes sde zhus te gtan la phab pa
67 Go08,04 Ca 62b1- Ca-Na 5b4 (Vol. 8) 'phags pa byams pa seng ge'i sgra chen po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo a r+ya me'i tri ya ma ha sing ga na dan nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra rgya gar gyi mkhan po 'dzi na myi tra dang / su len dra bo de dang / prad nya bar ma dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsha ba ban de ye shes sde las sogs pas bsgyurd cing zhus ste gtan la phab pa //
68 Go08,05 Ca-Na 5b5-20a4 (Vol. 8) 'phags pa 'dul pa rnam par gtan la dbab pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo r+ya bi ni ya bi ni sh+ca ya u pa li pa ri prid tsA nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra rgya gar gyi mkhan po 'dzi na myi tra dang / su ren dra bo [de] dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa la ban de ye shes sde las sogs pas bsgyurd cing zhus gtan la 'phab pa // shu log drug brgya //
69 Go08,06 Ca-Na 20a5-37b10 (Vol. 8) 'phags pa lhag pa'i bsam pa bskul pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo r+ya su r+ya ad r+ya d+ha sha ya san tso da na nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra
70 Go08,07 Ca-Na 38a1- 61b4 (Vol. 8) 'phags pa lag bzangs kyis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo a r+ya su ba ba hu pa ri prid tshA nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra rgya gar gyi mkhan po da na shi la dang / 'dzi na myi tra dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban de ye shes sde las sogs pas sgyur cing zhus te / skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa // shu log bdun brgya rtsa brgyad de / bam po gnyis pa //
71 Go08,08 Ca-Na 61b5-73a7 (Vol. 8) 'phags pa des pas zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo a r+ya sU ra ta pa ri prid tsha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra rgya gar gyi mkhan po 'dzi na myi tra dang / su ren dra po de dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsha ba ban de ye shes sde las sogs pas bsgyurd cing zhus te gtan la phab pa //
72 Go08,09 Ca-Na 73a8-81b9 (Vol. 8) 'phags pa dpas sbyin gyis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo a r+ya bI ra dad ta pa ri prid tsha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na myi tra dang / da na shi la dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyurd cing zhus te / skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa // bam po gcig shu lo ga gsum brgya' //
73 Go08,10 Ca-Na 81b9-91a12 (Vol. 8) 'phags pa bad sa'i rgyal po cher byed kyis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo a r+ya u da ya na bad sa rA dza pa ri prid tsha na ma pa ra ba rta rgya gar gi mkhan po 'dzi na myi tra dang / su ren dra po de dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsha ba ban de ye shes sde las sogs pas / bsgyurd cing zhus te gtan [la] phab pa // bam po gcig / shu log nyis brgya //
74 Go08,11 Ca-Na 91b1-96b7 (Vol. 8) 'phags pa bu mo blo gros bzang mos zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo a r+ya su ma ti d+wa ri ka prid tsha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra rgya gar gi mkhan po 'dzi na myi tra dang / su ren dra bo de dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban de ye shes [sde] las sogs pas // // bsgyurd cing zhus te gtan la phab pa /
75 Go08,12 Ca-Na 96b8-99b7 (Vol. 8) 'phags pa gang 'ga'i mchog gis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo A r+ya gang god ta ra nA ma sU tra
76 Go08,13 Ca-Na 99b8-Ca-Ma 12b10 (Vol. 8) 'phags pa mya ngan myed kyis byin pa lung bstand pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo a r+ya a sho ka dad ta bya ka ra na nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra rgya gar gyi mkhan po 'dzi na myi tra dang / su ren dra bo de dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban de ye shes sde zhus te / gtan la phab pa //
77 Go08,14 Ca-Ma 12b10-31b1 (Vol. 8) 'phags pa dri ma myed kyis byin pas zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo A r+ya bi ma la dad ta pa ri prid tsha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra rgya gar gyi mkhan po 'dzi na myi tra dang / su ren dra po de dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyurd cing zhus te gtan la phab pa / / bam po gnyis dang shu log lnga bcu //
78 Go08,15 Ca-Ma 31b1-35a7 (Vol. 8) 'phags pa yon tan rin po che me tog kun tu brgyas pas zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo a r+ya gu na rad na sang ku su myi ta prad tsha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra rgya gar gyi mkhan po 'dzi na myi tra dang / prad nya bar ma dang / zhu cen gyi lo tsa ba ban de ye shes sde lasogs pas bsgyurd cing zhus nas gtan la phab pa // shu log brgya bzhi bcu / bam po phyed // //
79 Go08,16 Ca-Ma 35a8-52a10 (Vol. 8) 'phags pa lha'i bu dpal bzangs kyis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo a r+ya a tsin t+ya bud d+ha bi shi ya nir de sha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra
The last line (Ca-Ma 52a10) shows substantial omissions; one line, containing the final rdzogs s+hoandprobably also the colophon, is missing.
80 Go09,01 Cha 1b1-51a10 (Vol. 9) 'phags pa lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas kyis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo A r+ya su s+thi ta ma ti de ba pu t+t+ra pa ri prid tsha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra ban d+he klu'i rgyal mtshan kyis bsgyurd cing zhus // // shu log stong nyis brgya // bam po bzhi //
81 Go09,02 Cha 51b1-54b7 (Vol. 9) 'phags pa seng ge zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo a r+ya sing ha pa ri pri tsa nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra nyis zhus // rgya gar gyi mkhan po da na shi la dang / mu ne bar ma dang / zhu cen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyurd cing zhus te / skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa // // shu log drug bcu // //
82 Go09,03 Cha 54b8-94b9 (Vol. 9) 'phags pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsang chen thabs la mkhas pa/ byang chub sems dpa' ye shes dam pas zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo a r+ya sa rba bud d+ha ra ha s+yo pa ya ko'u shal l+ya sa nya nod ta ra bod d+hi sad twa pa ri pri tsa pa ri pa rto nA nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra bam po bzhi dang shu log bcu gsum bzhugs // // rgya gar gyi mkhan po 'dzi na myi tra dang / su ren dra bo d+he dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban de ye shes sde las stsogs pas bsgyurd cing zhus te gtan la phab pa //
83 Go09,04 Cha 94b10-Cha-Na 17b2 (Vol. 9) 'phags pa tshong dpon bzang skyong gyis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo A rya b+had tra pA la sh+re s+tha pa ri pri tshA nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra rgya gar gyi mkhan po 'dzi na myi tra dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban de ye shes sdes zhus te gtan la phab pa // shu log drug brgya / bam po gnyis //
84 Go09,05 Cha-Na 17b2-26a2 (Vol. 9) bu mo rnam dag dad bas zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
85 Go09,06 Cha-Na 26a3-37a7 (Vol. 9) 'phags pa byams pas zhus pa'i le'u zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo A r+ya mye'i tra ya prid tsa pa ri ba rta nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra bam pa gcig dang shu log bcu / / rgya gar gyi mkhan po 'dzi na myi tra dang / su ren dra bo de dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyurd cing zhus te / skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab //
86 Go09,07 Cha-Na 37a7-40a2 (Vol. 9) 'phags pa byams pas zhus pa chos brgyad pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo A rya me'i tre ya pa ri pri tsa nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra rgya gar gyi mkhan po 'dzi na myi tra dang / da na shi la dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyurd cing zhus te / gtan la phab pa //
87 Go09,08 Cha-Na 40a3-69b4 (Vol. 9) 'phags pa 'od srung gi le'u zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo A r+ya ka sh+ya pa pa ri ba rta nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra bam po gsum / shu log dgu' brgya' // // rgya gar [gyi] mkhan po 'dzi na myi tra dang / shi len dra bo de dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyurd cing zhus ste // // skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la 'phab pa' // //
88 Go09,09 Cha-Na 69b5-91a8 (Vol. 9) 'phags pa rin po che'i phung bo zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo A r+ya rad na rA shi nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ren dra bo d+he dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyurd cing / gtan la phab pa / / bam po gnyis dang shu log bdun bcu // 1.

175 Go24,01 Ka 1b1-72b10, Ka-Na 77b4-97b3 (Vol. 24) 'phags pa blo gros mi zad pas bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo A r+ya a k+Sha ya ma ti nir de sha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba / ban d+he dar ma shi las zhus / skad gsar chad kyis kyang / bcos te btan la phab pa dang zhus / gnyis zhus / gzhon byang dang / lha gsum gyis dpe' dang lan gnyis gtugs // // The first part, corresponding to D 79a1–152b1, Q 82b4–158a3, merges into the second part of text 24.2. The second part, corresponding to D 152b1–174b7, Q 158a3–180a2, immediately follows the unidentified passage Ka-Na 76b4–77b3.

98 Go24,02 Ka-Na 70a1-76b4, Ka 72b10-85a1 (Vol. 24) 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin+d kyi rlabs// sems can thams cad la gzigs shing/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bkod pa kund tu stond pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo a r+ya sa rba ta thA ga ta a d+hi Sh+Thi na// sad twa a ba lo ka na/ bud d+ha k+she tra san da ra sha na byu ha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra rgya gar gi mkhan po 'dzi na myi tra dang / su ren 'dra bo de dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban de ye shes sdes zhus te gtan la 'phab pa / ban d+he klu'i rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyurd pa // dang zhus // gnyis zhus The first part, corresponding to D 98, 258a1–265a6; D 721, 180b1–187b6; Q 291b1–299b4, merges into an unidentified passage Ka-Na 76b4–77b3 which merges into the second part of text 24.1. The text appears in three blocks: Ka-Na 12b3-19b4 (correspon+ding to D 185a1-188a6 +168a2-171b6, Q 461b3-468a5 + 444a2-448a3) immediately follows the first part of text 24.6; its beginning is marked by a note in dbu med: 'di nas nor ba yin 'di'i stod ma gi na bzhugs; at the end it shows the concluding rdzogs sho, however without stating the title. Ka-Na 24a1-25a8 (correspon+ding to D 171b6-173a3, Q 448a3-449b2) follows after text 24.8andends again with the concluding rdzogs sho (without stating the title) + dang zhus. Ka-Ma 8a1-19a5 (corresponding to D 173a3-185a1, Q 449b2-461b3) follows text 24.10andmerges into the secon+d part of text 24.6 (Ka-Ma 19a5). The entries for L 233and234 in PAGEL 1996, "Li yul byuL nas li'i rgyal po rabs drug"and"Li yul gyi lo rgyus" are not titles, but passages from the text itself. In L, the same parts of the text are missing as in Go.

318b7 The end of chap. 1 is not indicated (cf. SUZUKI 1962, where chap. 1–3 are listed as "indistinct"). Ka-Ma 62b4 a text of ca. 3 folios (corresponding to D 138b6–142b2, Q 152a1–155b7) preceding the final sentence of the chapter is missing. The text of chap. 11 and 12 is incomplete and severely out of order, with the individual sections merging into one another without any indications thereof. The sequence is: Ka-Nga 2a2–4b1 (D 188a3–191a1, Q 204a3–207a2), Ka-Nga 5b3–6b4 (D 191a1–192a5, Q 207a2–208a7), one line missing within 6a5, Ka-Nga 4b1–5b3 (D 192a5–193b2, Q 208a7–209b4), Ka-Nga 6b4–5 (D 193b2f., Q 209b4f.), Ka-Nga 8b1–9a10 (D 193b3–194b5, Q 209b5–211a2), Ka-Nga 10b2–11b4 (D 194b5–196a2, Q 211a2–212a7), Ka-Nga 9a10–10b2 (D 196a3–197a6, Q 212a7–213b4), Ka-Nga 11b4–12a1 (D 197a6–197b4, Q 213b4–214a3), Ka-Nga 12b9–13b7 (D 197b4–198b4, Q 214a3–215a4), Ka-Nga 14b2–15a10 (D 198b4–199b5, Q 215a4–216a6), Ka-Nga 6b5–8b1 (D 199b5–201b6, Q 216a6–218b2), Ka-Nga 12a1–b9 (D 204a4–205a5, Q 221a2–222a3), Ka-Nga 13b7–14b2 (D 205a5–206a4, Q 222a3–223a4), Ka-Nga 15a10–18b7 (D 206a4–209b7, Q 223a4–227a8). A text of ca. 2 folios (correspon+ding to D 201b6-204a4, Q 218b2-221a2) is missing; it contains the end (ca. 1.5 lines) of chap. 11 and the beginning of chap. 12.

Incomplete; the following portions of the text are missing: between Ka 21 and 22 the equivalent of D Ya 109a1-110a6, Q 'U 115a4-116b2, apparently the contents of one folio of the recension copied, containing the last line of chap. 1 and the beginning of chap. 2; following Ka-Ma 21b7, the equivalent of D Ra 38a1-74a3, Q Yu 42a4-80a1 (= bam po 24-26, the indication "bam po 24" is followed by the text of bam po 27), containing the end of chap. 3 (ca. 11 folios)andthe beginning of chap. 4 (ca. 15 folios); within Ka-Ma 26b6, the equivalent of D Ra 80b6-112b4, Q Yu 86b7-121a1 (= end of bam po 27, bam po 28, 29, beginning of bam po 30; the point of intersection is marked by a cross in the text): ca. 23 folios of chap. 4; the final ca. 28 folios of the chapter were probably contained in vol. Kha, which is not extant. Ka-Ma 26b6-10 could not be identified, the text of D Ra 112b4, Q Yu 121a1 is continued on Ka-Ma 27a1; a note in dbu med at the beginning of Ka-Ma 27a1 reads: 'dir mang po char nas 'dug pas btsal la bsab po. For the following bam po 31 (Ka-Ma 33a11)and32 (Ka-Ma 43a10) no numbers are given, but some space is left blank for their later addition; 33 is numbered as nyi {diu} shu rtsa plus a blank space (Ka-Ma 55a9); 34 is not indicated at all (Ka-Ma 65a8); 35 (Ka-Ma 75a7)and36 (Ka-Ma 85b10) both show the later addition of the number 35 in numerical figures. The volume ends with bam po 36.
